description: Finally, the Paris Playboys convene for no other reason than to have a balls-to-the-wall knockout orgy in a glorious Parisian penthouse. Jonathan gets to know Mike through some kissing and heavy petting and its so hot that Marco Salgueiro joins in on the fun. Rafael has discovered a new French flame in the sultry and debonair Antonio Cavalli, and Christopher Smeyt graduates from Mike to some three-way action with Glenn Coste and Ricky Love. In a beautiful ensemble scene, these studs suck and fuck their way around the room leaving little to the imagination. The film climaxes when its stars do, all over the waiting mouths and bodies of Glenn and Mike.
title: Rafael Alencar and Michael Lucas Lead a Cum-Filled Parisian Orgy
